name: Jewel Magic Lite
description:

-------------------------
*** Game Facts ***

Jewel Magic adds several creative innovations to the already very popular match game concept with four differently themed game modes and unlimited levels of challenging fun.

Jewel Magic has four interesting game modes as below.
- JewelMagic Classic : Move timeout based addictive game.
- JewelMagic TimeAttack : Tests your raw gem matching speed.
- JewelMagic ScorePanic : Very dynamic fast paced game.
- JewelMagic Continuous : Non stop gem matching fun.

*** Game Features ***

JewelMagic Lite has all the features of JewelMagic. Except, you can play up to three levels in Classic & ScorePanic game modes, whereas JewelMagic has additional game modes with unlimited levels and you can compete with top players around the world.

All game modes have individual player ranking system based on the highest level/Score achieved. Players are ranked in five categories from Amateur to Legendary. Your rank naturally improves along with your skill as you play again and again, thats what makes JewelMagic so addictive.

Online Scores! Scores of top ten players from all over the world are listed in weekly and Monthly tabs of our online score screen. At any time, you can compete with top ten weekly and monthly scorers and submit your scores after every game.

Other Features:

- Awesome graphics with fluid animations.
- Auto saving & loading supported for all game modes.
- Plain Mode option to switch off special items.
- Magician clears all surrounding gems by matching two similar gems adjacent to him.
- Sackman clears all gems in a row or column by matching two similar gems adjacent to him.
- Smoke! Beware of them. Clear them before the moveout counter in each smoking gem reaches zero or else it will spread to your adjacent gems.
- Unlimited levels! It needs only your skill to crack a new level. Complexity of the game increases progressively from level to level. Could you ever reach Level10 in Classic/ScorePanic game mode? Well, let’s see!!!
